entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning.
